definition: to have no alternative/to be helpless

sentences.english: I missed the regular bus, so I had to go to work on foot.
sentences.chinese: 趕上班車，沒奈何只好步行去上班。

sentences.english: A blunt knife may be sharpened on a stone, but if a man is stupid there is no help for his stupidity.
sentences.chinese: 刀鈍石上磨，人蠢沒奈何。
